dataset_name: Tourist Arrivals by Country and Month
resource_section: Tourist Arrivals by country of Residence and Month (All Countries) -2023
remarks: Dataset contains tourist arrival statistics by month and country for 2023, showing monthly arrivals for 190 countries throughout the year. Columns: Country and 12 months (January through December). Data shows arrivals distributed across all months of 2023, indicating a recovery in tourism compared to 2020 when arrivals were concentrated in the first three months. The dataset allows for analysis of seasonal patterns and country-specific monthly trends.
